ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Trades

Class Trade

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Trades.Trade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    Trade object which holds all relevant information for a trade. Each trade has an inventory which is a list of the items involved in the trade, a unique TradeManager for the borrower and the owner, and a status.

        public void addObserver(java.util.Observer observer)

      • deleteObserver

        public void deleteObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
        Removes the specified observer from the list of observers. Passing null won't do anything.
        Specified by:
        deleteObserver in interface Observable
        Parameters:
        observer - the observer to remove.

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers()
        If hasChanged() returns true, calls the update() method for every observer in the list of observers using null as the argument. Afterwards, calls clearChanged().

        Equivalent to calling notifyObservers(null).

        Specified by:
        notifyObservers in interface Observable

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method override is responsible for determining how trades will be shown to the user when they view their Current Trades list and PAst Trades list. For each trade in the list, it's number, the other person involved in the trade (not LoggedInUser), it's status and the categories of the items involved will be displayed.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
